row.process: ! --------------------------------------------- :SET &MANDANT# = '&MANDANTEN#' :SET &SEL_BESCHREIBUNG# = 'LebensBesch_Eri_Selekt' :SET &PROGRAMMTYP# = '72' :SET &PROGRAM# = '&PROG_LC#' :SET &INIFILE# = '&PROGRAM#.ini' :SET &OPTIONS# = '&INIFILE#' :SET &LOGFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&SEL_BESCHREIBUNG#.log' :SET &OUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#.out' :SET &INPUTFILE# = '&LOGSRV#/&SUBSYS#/data/ABLAUFBATCH/zeiten' ! --------------------------------------------- cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&INIFILE# VON = &VALUTA_VON# BIS = &VALUTA_BIS# ABVTRNR = &AB_VTR_NR# BISVTRNR = &BIS_VTR_NR# TRACE = &TRACE# PROT_VTR_FILTER = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL# PROT_MSG_TYPE = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL# MANDANT = &MANDANT# BESCHREIBUNG = &SEL_BESCHREIBUNG# PROGRAMMTYP = &PROGRAMMTYP# LOGFILE = &LOGFILE# OUTFILE = &OUTFILE# ! mit cr31435 entfallen !NO_TIME_MINIMUM = &NO_TIME_MIN# __EOF__ ! --------------------------------------------- :IF &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = "J" echo 'Test &PROGRAM# &TS#_&SEL_BESCHREIBUNG#' > &WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#_1.out :ENDIF ! --------------------------------------------- !starten Anwendung :INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB ! ---------------------------------------------
